hooks.description: Load agent registry and inject available agents into session context
Pre-validate agent files before writing (syntax check)

hooks.prompt:
You just created/edited a file. If this is an agent file (.claude/agents/*.md):

1. Validate YAML frontmatter syntax
2. Check if tools listed exist in Claude Code native tools
3. Verify description is >= 50 characters and explains purpose
4. Confirm use cases are realistic and actionable
5. Check for security anti-patterns (e.g., unrestricted file access)

Return JSON:
{
  "decision": "approve" | "block" | "warn",
  "reason": "detailed explanation",
  "suggestions": ["list of improvements"]
}

If decision is 'block', I will prevent the file from being saved. If 'warn', I'll save but notify you.

hooks.description: Update agent registry after successful agent creation/edit
